ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND(Dealer__r.Name = 'Unknown Dealer- End User', NOT(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.RecordType.Name,'Express'))),AND(NOT(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.RecordType.Name,'HKF')), Dealer__r.Name = 'Unknown Dealer-HKF'), AND(NOT(CONTAINS(Opportunity__r.RecordType.Name,'Program')), OR(Dealer__r.Name = 'Unknown Dealer - Franchise',Dealer__r.Name = 'Unknown Dealer-SNAP')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Unknown dealers can only be attached to applicable ORTs (Express, HKF & Program) i. Express ORT 1. Unknown Dealer-End User ii. HKF ORT 1. Unknown Dealer-HKF iii. Program ORT 1. Unknown Dealer-Franchise 2. Unknown Dealer-SNAP
